title: Two Indias: Extreme deprivation and lofty economic goals reveal stark disparities that must be addressed
description: There are parts of India where people still live in stark deprivation. We must not lose sight of them amid all the talk of artificial intelligence, high-tech medical procedures and fast economic growth. The benefits of growing GDP and technology must reach all.
content: It was a panoramic view of a deep gash on the earth—two thousand feet deep and a few kilometres both in width and length. Dust suspended permanently in the air from the digging that was continuing at the bottom by massive earthmovers and excavators, ... [4738 chars]

title: Taiwanese electronics firm Foxconn's Q3 profit rises 17%, beats forecasts
description: Taiwan's Foxconn , the world's largest contract electronics maker, reported on Wednesday a 17% rise in third-quarter profit that beat market forecasts on sustained strength in demand for artificial intelligence servers.

title: AI Gains for Big Banks Pose a Competition Headache
description: Bank of America Corp. first launched its artificial-intelligence driven chatbot, Erica, nearly a decade ago in 2016. Several iterations and a wealth of patents later, the platform handles about 2 million customer interactions each day, the equivalent of what 11,000 employees could do.
content: (Bloomberg Opinion) -- Bank of America Corp. first launched its artificial-intelligence driven chatbot, Erica, nearly a decade ago in 2016. Several iterations and a wealth of patents later, the platform handles about 2 million customer interactions e... [5396 chars]

title: India unveils game-changer AI governance guidelines: What every business must know
description: The Ministry of Electronics & Information Technology (MeitY) has launched a comprehensive “India AI Governance Guidelines” under the India AI Mission aimed at safe, inclusive and responsible adoption of artificial intelligence. The framework is built on seven guiding principles and six governance pillars, emphasising “Do No Harm”, human-centricity, risk mitigation and innovation sandboxes. These guidelines signal a major shift for regulators, developers and enterprises in Indias AI ecosystem and will be key for professional audiences to understand as they prepare for the upcoming India–AI Impact Summit 2026.
content:

title: Humans Can No Longer Tell AI Music from the Real Thing: Survey
description: It has become nearly impossible for people to tell the difference between music generated by artificial intelligence and that created by humans, according to a survey.
content:
(AFP) — It has become nearly impossible for people to tell the difference between music generated by artificial intelligence and that created by humans, according to a survey released Wednesday.

title: Asian shares are mixed in cautious trading after a mixed day on Wall Street
description: Asian shares were mixed Wednesday in cautious trading after most U.S. stocks rose, settling back to where they were before last week's swoon over the future of artificial intelligence.
content:
